body:
School illusion (glamer)

Level alchemist 2, bard 2, inquisitor 2, magus 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, summoner 2, witch 2

Duration 1 round/level

Saving Throw Will negates (harmless)

Spell Resistance yes (harmless)

Target Restrictions selected

This effect word functions as fade, but with a longer duration.
name: Disappear
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Effect Words/Concealing Words/Disappear

sections.body: The target does not become visible if it attacks or takes an offensive action. Boosting this effect word increases its level by 2.
sections.name: Boost
